entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or rain with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
